# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4406696586
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4406696586
* **Publication Date**: April 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 11, 2024, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Status**: Cancelled

## Tender Details

* **Description**: This tender invitation is for the supply of motive fuel tanks W6888-23-4812.
* **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (Government of Canada)
* **End-User**: Department of National Defence (Canada)
* **Delivery Location**: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

## Business Terms

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal - Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: None specified
* **Language**: English and French

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority Representative**: Simms, Julie (elle-la / she-her)
* **Email Address**: [julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:julie.simms@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone Number**: Not available
* **Fax Number**: Not available

## UNSPC Codes*

* **24111800**: Tanks and cylinders and their accessories
* **24111808**: Fuel storage tanks

Note: Contradictory information appears to have been provided in the original text regarding the tender status ('Cancelled' in English and 'Annulé' in French). To maintain consistency and clarity, 'Cancelled' has been used throughout the rewritten text.
